entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
